Title: Authorizes the county of Monroe to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to Gregory M. Prokop
Summary: Authorizes the county of Monroe to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to Gregory M. Prokop, a deputy sheriff/investigator employed by the county of Monroe.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the county of Monroe to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to Gregory M. Prokop, a deputy sheriff employed by such county
